description: This retrieves the invoice unit definition.

parameters.name: InvoiceUnitArn
parameters.description: The ARN to identify an invoice unit. This information can't be modified or deleted.

nested_items.name: InvoiceUnitArn
nested_items.description: The ARN to identify an invoice unit. This information can't be modified or deleted.

nested_items.name: InvoiceReceiver
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID chosen to be the receiver of an invoice unit. All invoices generated for that invoice unit will be sent to this account ID.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The unique name of the invoice unit that is shown on the generated invoice.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The assigned description for an invoice unit.

nested_items.name: TaxInheritanceDisabled
nested_items.description: Whether the invoice unit based tax inheritance is/ should be enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: LinkedAccounts
nested_items.description: The list of LINKED_ACCOUNT IDs where charges are included within the invoice unit.

nested_items.name: LastModified
nested_items.description: The most recent date the invoice unit response was updated.
